title: 11 "Don't Turn Into the Mega-Playboy!"Transliteration: "Megapure ni Naccha Dame!!" (Japanese:メガプレになっちゃダメ!!) December 16, 1994(1994-12-16)
transformers_text: 11 Don't Turn Into the Mega Playboy Transliteration Mega pure ni Nac cha Dame Japanese December 16 1994 1994 12 16 Junta believes the only way he can defeat Ry ji is by transforming into Mega Playboy however Karin is opposed to it because the change might be permanent Karin tries to fight Ry ji herself but when Junta and Ami arrive she has already been beaten
tf_idf_text: dont turn mega playboy transliteration mega pure nac cha dame japanese december junta believe way defeat transform mega playboy however karin opposed change might permanent karin try fight junta ami arrive already beat
